div.p: PsychCare Services Telehealth is an online Youth Mental Health Service that specialises in proving expert clinical assessments and treatment recommendations for a range of mental health disorders. PsychCare Services has been proving Telehealth services across Australia for the last 10 years and works with a number of Headspace sites and GP practices. With years of experience, our Psychiatrists will create an individualised recovery plan that is right for you. We firmly believe in providing high quality and accessible mental health care regardless of where you live.
We offer comprehensive assessment and treatment plans for a range of developmental and mental health disorders. Your GP remains your main doctor responsible for your ongoing care and scripts.
We offer clinical assessments and treatment plans for Autism Spectrum Disorders (ASD) and Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD).
We specialise in the diagnosis and management of a range of Anxiety Disorders in young people aged 12 to 25.
We specialise in the diagnosis and management of emerging and treatment resistant Depression in young people aged 12 to 25.
We offer comprehensive assessment and treatment plans for you people who have experienced a range of trauma.
We offer comprehensive assessment and treatment plans for young people who have PTSD
